result.title: Machine Learning Developer / Data Scientist
result.description:
*** Strong hands-on technical in Python / SQL and Machine Learning skills required. ***

Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced Machine Learning Developer with 3 to 10 years of relevant hands-on work experiences. 

The developer will be part of business intelligence / data science Division reporting to CDO (Chief Data Officer). 
This candidate must be detail-oriented and have excellent problem-solving and communication skills. 
Specifically we will look at the candidate’s Python Programming and Machine Learning project experiences, 
as well as his / her expertise in Math / Algorithm / Statistics.

Skills with SQL programming (Microsoft SQL Server) and Power BI would be a big plus.

The machine learning developer will primarily focus on comprehensively creating and improving 
data preparation and analytics processes, optimizing data analytics capabilities throughout the 
organization with Microsoft SQL Server, Python, Power BI, and Machine Learning Algorithms and Statistics.
result.notes: Both candidates and headhunters (placement agents) are welcome to contact me via wechat.
